text:
I hope this problem is a simple one to solve.
I've tried allmost everything but the browser will not send any information 
trough $var. Php and mysql works fine the same with apache but the moment I 
try to send something trough a form, press a link with any kind of $var 
nothing happens. The url changes just like it should but I cant get the values 
thats in it. Or the ones that should be saved in sessions.

This is an example frome the error log.

[Wed Dec 11 08:11:37 2002] [notice] Parent: Created child process 1824
[Wed Dec 11 08:11:39 2002] [notice] Child 1824: Child process is running
[Wed Dec 11 08:11:39 2002] [notice] Child 1824: Acquired the start mutex.
[Wed Dec 11 08:11:40 2002] [notice] Child 1824: Starting 250 worker threads.
[Wed Dec 11 08:52:32 2002] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] File does not exist: 
C:/webprog/Apache2/htdocs/www.login.pentex.no/gfx/design, referer: 
http://localhost/www.login.pentex.no/
[Wed Dec 11 08:52:43 2002] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] File does not exist: 
C:/webprog/Apache2/htdocs/www.login.pentex.no/gfx/design, referer: 
http://localhost/www.login.pentex.no/

I've tried to find simulare bugs on this site but I did not find any.

Øyvind M. Magerøy
creator: slemfisk@online.no

text:
This is a problem with your php configuration.  See the information on
register globals in the php faq.  And in the future, please use a user
support group before posting to the bug database.

Thanks for using Apache!
creator: slive@apache.org
nd@perlig.de
text: no further response. Closing this bug.
